test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator) (type X container))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave) (type X container))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y washmachine) (type Y container))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y bed))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y closet) (type Y container))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y cupboard) (type Y container))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y washmachine) (type Y container))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green) (sort Y desk))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y washmachine) (type Y container)))) )
test.nl: The refrigerator is closed. The microwave is opened. The remotecontrol is in the washmachine. Put a can on the bed. Put a cup in the closet. Put the white book in the cupboard. Take out the remotecontrol from washmachine. Put the green book on desk. The yellow book must be in microwave.
